## typeAll() function

Analyze the type of all fields in an array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function typeAll(array: Record<string, any>[], fields?: string[]): FieldsInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>Record&lt;string, any&gt;[]</code> | data |
|  fields | <code>string[]</code> | the fields which you need to analyze |

<b>Returns:</b>

`FieldsInfo`
